info.title: Platform Login Dialog
info.description: Creates a login dialog for use in pages and in applications.

const.name: LGN_TYPE_PAGE
const.description: The page login type. It reloads the page after the login.

const.name: LGN_TYPE_APP
const.description: The application login type. It reloads the page after the login.

parameter.name: $username
parameter.description: The default username value for the input. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $logintype
parameter.description: The login dialog type. See class constants for more information.

parameter.name: $return_url
parameter.description: Provide a redirect url after successful login. Leave empty for default action (reload or redirect to my). It is empty by default.

method.name: getReport
method.description: Get the login dialog server report in popup form.

parameter.name: $background
parameter.description: Whether the popup will have a background overlay. It is TRUE by default.

parameter.name: $fade
parameter.description: Whether the popup will show with a fade. It is TRUE by default.

parameter.name: $usernameValue
parameter.description: The default username value for the input. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $logintype
parameter.description: The login dialog type. See class constants for more information.

parameter.name: $return_url
parameter.description: Provide a redirect url after successful login. Leave empty for default action (reload or redirect to my). It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $return_url
parameter.description: Sets the register dialog link with the given return url after registration. It is empty by default.
